name: SparkplugByCreateAbility
0:
”Alexa, tell spark plug to turn on the fan”
”Alexa, ask spark plug to get the status of the fan”
”Alexa, ask spark plug to turn on the living room light”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spark plug
des:
This is a companion skill to beam.care and CreateAbility's in-home system. It can be used to control and receive the status of linked devices. This skill is for informational and command/control purposes only.

To use this skill, you will need to have an account on beam.care and have a CreateAbility in-home system running the latest version of software.
